ModMetaData.name: Small Shelf
ModMetaData.author: Proxyer
ModMetaData.description: Description : Small shelf: works like a normal shelf but has 1x1 size, holds anything Note for 1.4: 1.4 vanilla add a "small shelf". The differences between vanilla and this mod are as follows. - Nothing is selected by default. - This mod shelf allows rock chunks and building categories items. - Priority is Important (Vanilla : Preferred). Update 1.4.1 - Add oldstyle small shelf. It's the old style that only holds 1 stack. - Add Ideology Techist style. Update 1.4.2 - The small shelf and old shelf build buttons are now displayed when selecting various shelfs. Note : This feature is only for RimWorld 1.4.3555 and above. - Added small shelf and old shelf building buttons to various production benches in Core. Update 1.4.3 - Added small shelf building buttons to styling station in Ideology DLC. Art from CuproPanda's "CorePanda" mod. Translation included : English, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean, Turkish Russian (by MarioMustach) Update to RimWorld 1.4 version. Original Art author : CorePanda
